0R1.F.summary: Royal Unibrew A/S produces, markets, sells, and distributes beer, malt, soft drinks, ciders, and ready-to-drink products. The company also provides spring water, natural mineral water, energy drinks, fruit juices, nectar drinks, long drinks, and cocktail products. It offers its products under the Royal Beer, SchiÃ¸tz, Lottrup, Kissmeyer, Anarkist, Albani, Ceres, Thor, Faxe Kondi, Nikoline, Egekilde, Faxe Kondi Booster, Tempt, Polar Monkey, Lorina, CULT Energy, SHAKER, MOKAÃ, PureThÃ©, InFreshhh, LemonSoda, OranSoda, PelmoSoda, TonicSoda, Crodo Lisiel, Crodo Chinotto, Karjala, Lapin Kulta, Aura, Lahden Erikois, Mattson, Original Long Drink, Upcider, Happy Joe, Jaffa, ED, Booster, Novelle, Kalnapilis, Taurus, the Vilkmerges, Cido, Mangali, Fruts, Lacplesa Alus, Livu Alus, the Lielvardes, Meistriti Gildi, Vitamalt, Supermalt, and Powermalt brands. The company also provides license-based international brands, such as Heineken and PepsiCo; and a range of international spirits and wine brands, including Johnny Walker, Captain Morgan, Lanson, Baileys, and JP. Chenet on an agency basis. It serves customers in Denmark, Germany, Italy, France, Finland, Lithuania, Latvia, Estonia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Bryggerigruppen A/S and changes its name to Royal Unibrew A/S in 2005. Royal Unibrew A/S is headquartered in Faxe, Denmark.

6BF.F.summary: P/F Bakkafrost, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells salmon products under the Bakkafrost and HavsbrÃºn brands in the United States, Europe, China, and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Fish Farming FO; Fish Farming SCT; Value Added Products; and Fishmeal, Fish Oil, and Fish Feed. It is involved in the breeding and on-growing of salmon; harvesting, sale, and distribution of salmon; and production of skinless and boneless portions of salmon. The company also produces and sells fishmeal, fish oil, and fish feed. The company also exports its products. P/F Bakkafrost was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Glyvrar, Denmark.

902.F.summary: Alefarm Brewing A/S, a craft brewery, engages in the production of beers. It offers ales and stouts in various flavors. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Greve, Denmark.

ALEFRM.CO.summary: Alefarm Brewing A/S, a craft brewery, engages in the production of beers. It offers ales and stouts in various flavors. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Greve, Denmark.

CABGY.summary: Carlsberg A/S produces and sells beer and other beverage products in Western Europe, Eastern Europe, and Asia. The company provides craft and specialty, and non-alcoholic beers; and soft drinks. It offers its products primarily under the Carlsberg, Baltika, Tuborg, birell, Ringnes, and other local brand names. Carlsberg A/S also exports its products to approximately 100 countries worldwide. The company was founded in 1847 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

FFARMS.CO.summary: FirstFarms A/S, through its subsidiaries, purchases, modernizes, and operates farming companies and land in Eastern Europe. It primarily engages in milk, pig, and field production activities. The company offers cow milk; cash crops consisting of rape, wheat, malt barley, rye, and maize; and crops for fodder comprising maize and Lucerne silage, sorghum, and hay. It has a land portfolio of 9,200 hectares of owned land and approximately 10,500 hectares of rent contracts; 2,600 cows and 2,700 young stock; and 4,800 sows, 170,000 piglets, and 100,000 slaughter pigs in Hungary. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Billund, Denmark.

HARB-B.CO.summary: Harboes Bryggeri A/S develops, produces, and markets beverages and malt-based food ingredients. The company offers beer under the Bear Beer, Harboe Beer, Darguner, and Puls brands; non-alcoholic dark malts under the Hyper Malt brand; energy drinks under the XRAY brand; and soft drinks under the Harboe Sodas, the Ego Organic, Caribia Ginger Beer, and Other brands. It also provides orange, apple, pineapple, grapefruit, and pear juices under the PURE brand; and specialty products under the GB brand, as well as offers drink mixer under the Eagle brand. The company sells its products to approximately 90 countries worldwide. Harboes Bryggeri A/S was founded in 1883 and is headquartered in SkÃ¦lskÃ¸r, Denmark.

NOAP.OL.summary: Nordic Aqua Partners A/S provides aquaculture services. It offers harvesting services for land-based Atlantic salmon. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Ribe, Denmark.

SCHO.CO.summary: Aktieselskabet Schouw & Co. operates as an industrial conglomerate in Denmark and internationally. It operates through BioMar, Fibertex Personal Care, Fibertex Nonwovens, GPV, HydraSpecma, and Borg Automotive segments. The company manufactures and sells feed for the salmon, trout, sea bass, sea bream, and shrimp to the shrimp and fish farming industry; spunbond/spunmelt nonwovens for the personal care industry; and non-woven textiles used for various industrial applications, including for cars, construction, and filtration solutions. It also manufactures and trades in hydraulic components and systems for industry and the aftermarket; remanufactured automotive parts for the automotive industry; and manufactures technical electronics, mechanics, and mechatronics. Aktieselskabet Schouw & Co. was founded in 1878 and is headquartered in Aarhus, Denmark.

STG.CO.summary: Scandinavian Tobacco Group A/S manufactures and sells handmade and machine-made cigars, and pipe tobacco worldwide. It operates through three divisions: North America Online & Retail; North America Branded & Rest of World; and Europe Branded. The company also produces fine-cut tobacco and sells tobacco-related accessories. Scandinavian Tobacco Group A/S markets its cigars primarily under the CafÃ© CrÃ¨me, La Paz, Macanudo, CAO, Partagas (US), and Cohiba (US) brands; pipe tobacco principally under the Captain Black, Erinmore, Borkum Riff, and W.Ã. Larsen brands; and fine-cut tobacco primarily under the Bugler, Break, Escort, Bali Shag, and Tiedemanns brands. The company sells its cigars in the United States through online and catalogue retail. In addition, it offers contract manufacturing services and fire products; and distributes lighters, matches, filters and tubes/paper, and other products, as well as licenses its brands to third parties. The company was founded in 1750 and is based in Gentofte, Denmark.
